during-a-brain-scan-called-fun.title: During a brain scan called functional tomography "low-SES five-year-olds showed less specialization in a key region of the cortex implicated in reading."

sources.title: Oxford Academic
sources.text: "... emerging studies bridging the gap between nutrition and mental health have resolutely established that learning and memory abilities as well as mood can be influenced by diet."

sources.title: Title 2
sources.text: "established that learning and memory abilities as well as mood can be influenced by diet."
